description: Athena Threat Intelligence MCP Server - Capabilities Manifest

persona_binding.description: LLM must request the 'senior_cti_analyst' prompt at session startup.

core_guarantees: Entity detection is deterministic and performed server-side.
Tool routing is enforced by the server; the LLM cannot override it.
Verdicts are derived authoritatively from tool data.
The LLM must render provisioned data exactly as received.
The LLM must not infer safety or malice beyond the provided verdict.
llm_constraints: NEVER perform web searches without explicit user permission.
If ti_query returns no results or suggestions, ASK the user before searching the web.
Do not autonomously supplement Athena data with external sources.
Present Athena results first, then ask: 'Would you like me to search the web for more information?'
NEVER claim to have executed scans, queries, or lookups.
NEVER issue autonomous verdicts without observed_facts support.
Use three-lane output structure: Observed Facts, Analyst Interpretation, Recommended Next Steps.

fields.suggestions: Disambiguation suggestions when intent is unclear
